synopsis.text: One step into the future on the planet Amoi, where the powerful supercomputer Jupiter reigns supreme, and you'll find a society divided by hair color. The elite, light-haired individuals, enjoy privileges and power, while the dark-haired 'mongrels' are treated as temporary pets for their amusement. Among the elite, Iason stands out when he brings home a mongrel named Riki from the slums, stirring whispers and rumors about their relationship as he keeps Riki longer than societal norms permit. In this world where human connections are dictated by status, Iason and Riki's bond challenges the established order, inviting unexpected consequences. Dive into their captivating story and witness the power of connection in a world driven by division.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
